member.name: T:Program.webService
member.summary: Provides the types to access a WSDL web service
member.param: The Uri for the WSDL service
The .wsdlschema file to store locally cached service schema
Require that a direct connection to the service be available at design-time and force the refresh of the local schema file (default: true)
The folder used to resolve relative file paths at compile-time (default: folder containing the project or script)
Implement the System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged interface on all DataContract types to enable data binding (default: false)
Generate classes marked with the Serializable Attribute (default: false)
Generate both synchronous and asynchronous method signatures (default: false, which means generate only synchronous method signatures)
A fully-qualified or assembly-qualified name of the type to use as a collection data type when code is generated from schemas
